attributes.action: Remove the CBE awarded to Chris Packham.
attributes.background: Chris Packham has received a CBE for services to conservation. In reality, Packham’s agenda is political and he has done great damage to conservation efforts carried out by the genuine custodians of the countryside. We therefore ask that his CBE be removed.

rejection.details:
We can't accept petitions asking for people's honours to be taken away. You can find out more about how honours are taken away here:

https://www.gov.uk/guidance/having-honours-taken-away-forfeiture
